    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientPlugin

        public ClientPlugin(ClientParser.Client clientData,
                    java.util.Map<PortName,java.lang.String> inboundPortUris,
                    java.util.Map<PortName,java.lang.String> outboundPortUris,
                    java.util.List<TestParser.Test> tests)
        Constructs a ClientPlugin with the specified client data, inbound port URIs, outbound port URIs, and list of tests.
        Parameters:
        clientData - The data for the client including frequencies, timeouts, and target information.
        inboundPortUris - A map of port names to inbound port URIs.
        outboundPortUris - A map of port names to outbound port URIs.
        tests - A list of tests to be performed by this client.
